main event: An Air Force plane was downed by an unidentified object over Piainview, Texas, on July 23, 1956.
interesting points: The pilot saw a bright light just before hearing a loud bang and experiencing severe vibration,The plane nearly crashed due to damage to its tail assembly but landed safely thanks to the pilot's skill,The object was estimated to be the size of a medium jet and traveling at over 600 knots before the incident,There were reported UFO sightings in California around the same time,The Air Force speculated that unusual atmospheric conditions may have contributed to the incident.
sighted object: a bright light or unidentified object
witness description: the pilot and crew members of the Air Force plane
